title: Router.inferWithModel
content: Router.inferWithModel inferWithModel Infer a router constructed around an endpoint type . This type must be an F# union type, and its cases should use EndPointAttribute to declare how they match to a URI.

title: Router.infer
content: Router.infer infer Infer a router constructed around an endpoint type . This type must be an F# union type, and its cases should use EndPointAttribute to declare how they match to a URI.

title: Html.text
content:
Html.text text Create an HTML text node. When inside an HTML computation expression, a text node can be inserted by simply yielding a string, without having to wrap it in M:text. 
 let helloWorld =
     div {
         text "Hello, "  // `text` can be used to create a text node.
         "world!"        // But inside an element, a simple string is equivalent.
     }
val helloWorld: obj

title: virtualize.items
content:
virtualize.items 
items 
Pass a direct collection of items to a Virtualize component.

title: virtualize.itemsProvider
content:
virtualize.itemsProvider 
itemsProvider 
Generate the items of a Virtualize component on the fly.

title: virtualize.comp
content: virtualize.comp comp Computation expression builder to create a Virtualize component. The contents of the computation expression should be: 1. component parameters, if any; 2. let! to bind the current item to M:items or M:itemsProvider; 3. the body of an item.

title: virtualize.placeholder
content:
virtualize.placeholder 
placeholder 
A component parameter indicating the placeholder content shown while an item is loading.

title: virtualize.itemSize
content:
virtualize.itemSize 
itemSize 
A component parameter indicating the height of an item in CSS points.

title: virtualize.overscanCount
content:
virtualize.overscanCount 
overscanCount 
A component parameter indicating the number of extra items to load for smooth scrolling.
